front.title: Draft Trial-Use Standard for Optical A.C. Current and Voltage Sensing Systems

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This trial-use standard is intended for use as a basis for describing the performance of optical current and voltage measurement systems used in the generation, transmission, and distribution of alternating current electricity, and to assist in the proper selection of such equipment. This trial-use standard covers certain physical characteristics of the sensing systems that use optical techniques to measure current and voltage. This trial-use standard provides the requirements for the performance characteristics and the test of optical current and voltage sensors of a nominal system voltage of 1 kV and above, the information related to the nature of these sensors, and the information related to the application and use of these sensors.
